title: Ep. 621 - The Afro-Cuban White Supremacist
description:
Trump refuses to condemn white supremacists (except for all the times he’s condemned white supremacists), a leftist TV host calls presidential debates “a threat to black life,” and a professor is forced to apologize for liking college football.
If you like The Michael Knowles Show, become a member TODAY with promo code: KNOWLES and enjoy the exclusive benefits for 10% off at https://www.dailywire.com/knowles
